course_description: Course offers students opportunity to earn one academic credit for off-campus internship experience alongside disciplinary work with a faculty member, typically during the Fall or Spring. Pre-requisite: Completion of LTL_OX 100 or Career Services Readiness program.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2439, Section #: 1, Type: IND, Campus: OXF, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: M. Hage, Status: Closed
